title: Understanding and Utilizing Cybersecurity Intrusion Detection Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Combining smartphone-based mobile learning with offline practical training, focusing on workplace application cases for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the 1D CNN-BiLSTM-MHA hybrid architecture of the GeoGuard system and comparatively analyze the roles of its components.
Learners can demonstrate the network traffic data preprocessing procedures (normalization, noise removal, feature extraction) using simulation tools.
Learners can identify anomalous patterns and develop response strategies in intrusion detection scenarios utilizing geotagging.
Learners can analyze case studies of Focal Loss applications for addressing class imbalance issues and incorporate them into evaluation metrics.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
